channel.title: A MM/sheriff Idea that can improve the deduction of the game
channel.description:
I have an idea about the MM/Sheriff
When the MM or Sheriff die, at night/day, the game will say for example: "andrew magnis was a sheriff/Mastermind" This will help give the game a better version of deduction. it will also help other players claim sheriff and make the sheriff less OP.
Also, change Surveillance so it won't confirm the sheriff, in order to this idea work.
